item.title: Trump announces 25% tariff on India and unspecified penalties for buying Russian oil
item.description: President Donald Trump says he'll impose a 25% tariff on goods from India, plus an additional import tax because of India’s purchasing of Russian oil

item.title: As Trump's tariff deadline looms, a clothing factory in the tiny African nation of Lesotho goes dark
item.description: Officials and workers in the textile industry of the small African nation of Lesotho are holding their breath as a key deadline for U.S.-imposed tarif...

item.title: Sen. John Fetterman releases memoir 'Unfettered' this fall, looking at political and health battles
item.description: Sen. John Fetterman's publisher has announced the release of his memoir, “Unfettered,” set for Nov. 11

item.title: Medicaid was signed into law 60 years ago. Trump's big bill is chiseling it back
item.description: This summer, President Donald Trump has begun to chisel back Medicaid and food stamps

item.title: Nissan racks up red ink, but the Japanese automaker promises a return to profit later this year
item.description: Japanese automaker Nissan has reported a 115.8 billion yen, or $782 million, loss in April-June, but is promising to return to profitability later thi...
